'''Cloudleisure Steps''' are exploration puzzles found in [[Golden Apple Archipelago/2.8|Golden Apple Archipelago]] during [[Summertime Odyssey]]. They appear as large jellyfishes that floats above water. When the player steps on one, it will light up. Once an entire group of Cloudleisure Steps are lit up, the next group will appear. When all groups are lit up, a [[chest]] will appear.

Approaching a Cloudleisure Step while sailing with [[Miitoboru]] will trigger the one of the following dialogues:
{{Transclude|Kosekimaru|Approaching a Cloudleisure Step}}

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/12?shown_types=366 Teyvat Interactive Map] for locations.

|image2 = Tutorial Cloudleisure Steps 2.png
|text2 = There are two types of Cloudleisure Steps: one can be used as a normal floating platform, while the other type can increase characters' {{color|help|jumping power}}.

|image3 = Tutorial Cloudleisure Steps 3.png
|text3 = When you set foot on a Cloudleisure Step, it {{color|help|will light up}}.<br />Such steps usually appear in groups. The next group of steps will only appear once the current group has been {{color|help|completely lit up}}.
}}
